participant_1.background:
I do my best in school, and I love to dance with my team when I have free time.
i am a professional gamer.
i want people to think i m cool.
i just started college.
my parents own a business that i m now running.

participant_2.background:
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
I learned that my best friend was lying to me about everything.
I don't have a car, but I often bike to the basketball court.
I like to read books and watch documentaries to expand my knowledge.
My most valued possession is my dog, who has never failed to make me smile.

content.text: Hello there, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read books and watch documentaries to expand my knowledge.
Oh that sounds interesting, have any favorites?
I recently read about the history of the Titanic. It was really sad but also really interesting.
Yeah that is a good book. I read it a few years ago. Did you see the movie?
I did, it was really good. I watched it with my family.
I'm glad you liked it. It's one of my favorite movies.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games. I'm a professional gamer.
Oh that's cool! What games do you like to play?
I play a lot of different games, but my favorite is League of Legends.
I've never played that game, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a lot of fun. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog. He's a golden retriever named Buddy.
Golden retrievers are the best! I had one when I was a kid.
